job_tasks.phrase: Build squeaky-clean (production-grade) code for our platform and its individual components, including a generative AI tool that has already produced over 40+ million images.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of writing high-quality code for a platform and its components, which is a fundamental software development task. The mention of a 'generative AI tool' indicates integration of AI into the software.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure we stay on course. E.g., by limiting tech debt, fostering a collaborative spirit, and co-creating an effective way of working.
job_tasks.justification: Limiting technical debt and co-creating an effective way of working are standard software engineering practices aimed at maintaining the quality and efficiency of the development process.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the launch of community tools.
job_tasks.justification: Launching tools is a software development and deployment activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Promote agility and, together with the team, iterate fast and make data-driven decisions.
job_tasks.justification: Promoting agility and iterating fast are core software development methodologies and practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Steer technical roadmaps and guide responsible innovation.
job_tasks.justification: Steering technical roadmaps and guiding innovation involves understanding business strategy and translating it into technical direction.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to a culture where feedback and knowledge-sharing are a given.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to fostering a collaborative environment through feedback and knowledge sharing.

job_tasks.phrase: As Lead Go Engineer, you are one of the drivers of ongoing platform success and (help) develop and deliver products and apps that are seen, utilized, and (hopefully) loved by 4m+ global users.
job_tasks.justification: Driving platform success and developing/delivering products and apps are core software engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Given the scope and complexity, the role calls for in-depth tech expertise, as well as the ability to rally peers behind your vision.
job_tasks.justification: In-depth tech expertise is a general requirement for software engineering roles, and rallying peers behind a vision relates to technical leadership within software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Wearing the 'Lead' hat means a high level of technical leadership in the domain, rather than managerial responsibilities
job_tasks.justification: Technical leadership in the context of software development is classified under Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you'll zoom in on forward-looking products and services.
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating with cross-functional teams to focus on products and services is a software development team activity.

job_tasks.phrase: These include AI-driven tools, some of which are quickly maturing, while others are still in their infancy, like our chatbot.
job_tasks.justification: Working with AI-driven tools and chatbots falls under the integration of AI into software products.

job_tasks.phrase: What does our expanding user community expect and desire from us? And how can we deliver?
job_tasks.justification: Understanding user community expectations and figuring out how to deliver solutions aligns with business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll also build and implement services that interact with the platform to ensure scalability, reliability, and security.
job_tasks.justification: Building and implementing services for scalability, reliability, and security are core software engineering tasks.

soft_skills.phrase: Steer technical roadmaps and guide responsible innovation.
Contribute to a culture where feedback and knowledge-sharing are a given.
the ability to rally peers behind your vision.
Wearing the 'Lead' hat means a high level of technical leadership in the domain, rather than managerial responsibilities
Together with fellow developers, engineers, designers, and product managers, you'll zoom in on forward-looking products and services.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks (writing production-grade code, managing tech debt, launching tools, promoting agility, building scalable services) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it mentions 'generative AI tool', 'AI-driven tools', and 'chatbot', these are presented as features to be integrated into the platform rather than the primary focus of model development or specialization. The role's core is software engineering with AI integration, fitting the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the core responsibilities being software development and technical leadership within that domain. The AI components are mentioned as features to be built or integrated, not as the primary focus of deep AI/ML research or model development. This clarity allows for a confident classification.
